author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TerraSky to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - TerraSky Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 280,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between May 8 and May 10
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 100 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/aNvTaw
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
